node.title: Maxwell accuser claims to have given Epstein sexual massages when she was 14
node.alt: A court sketch shows Ghislaine Maxwell, a brunette woman wearing a disposable face mask, sitting in a court room
node.description: A third woman who has accused Ghislaine Maxwell of grooming her for abuse by the late financier Jeffrey Epstein testifies at the British socialite's criminal trial that, as a 14-year-old, she gave Epstein sexual massages.
node.content:
["A third woman who has accused Ghislaine Maxwell of grooming her for abuse by the late financier Jeffrey Epstein has testified at the British socialite's criminal trial that, as a 14-year-old, she gave Epstein sexual massages.", "The woman, identified as Carolyn, recalled how Epstein would touch her breasts and buttocks, and that the encounters would end with Epstein masturbating until he ejaculated.", "\"Something sexual happened every single time,\" Carolyn, who chose not to reveal her last name, told jurors in Manhattan Federal Court.", "Carolyn said Maxwell would sometimes call her to schedule appointments with Epstein, during each of which she would be paid $300 to $400, and that Ms Maxwell once touched her while she was preparing to massage Epstein.", "She said she had told Ms Maxwell she was 14 years old.", "", "
Another woman testifying against British socialite Ghislaine Maxwell, Jane, also told the court she was 14 years old at the time of the abuse.\u00a0(AP)
", "\"I was fully nude and she came in and she felt my boobs and my hips and my buttocks and said that \u2026\u00a0I had a great body for Mr\u00a0Epstein and his friends,\" Carolyn said.", "Maxwell, 59, has pleaded not guilty to eight counts of sex trafficking and other charges.", "Carolyn is the third of four women identified in Ms Maxwell's 2021 indictment as her victims.", "The trial began on November\u00a029 and is expected to continue into January.", "Ms Maxwell's lawyers have claimed the memories of the four alleged victims have been corrupted over the years, and that Ms Maxwell was being prosecuted only because Epstein was no longer alive.", "The globetrotting investor killed himself in 2019, at the age of 66, in a Manhattan jail cell while awaiting sex trafficking charges.", "Last week, jurors heard from a woman known by the pseudonym Jane, who testified that Epstein sexually abused her beginning in 1994 while she was 14 years old.", "Jane said Ms Maxwell sometimes participated in their encounters, which often began as massages before escalating.", "On Monday, jurors also heard from Kate, a pseudonym for a woman who said she had sexual encounters with Epstein from the age of 17.", "Prosecutors referred to Kate as a \"minor victim\" in the indictment, however,.\u00a0US\u00a0District Judge Alison Nathan instructed the jury on Monday that the witness\u00a0was above the age of consent at the time Epstein and Ms Maxwell 's actions were being recalled.", "Reuters\u00a0"]
